text: Philip Daniel "Flip" Saunders (February 23, 1955 â€“ October 25, 2015) was an American basketball player and coach. During his career, he coached the Minnesota Timberwolves, Detroit Pistons and Washington Wizards. He began his career as a coach in 1977. He retired in 2015, due to health reasons. Saunders was born in Cleveland, Ohio. He studied at the University of Minnesota. Saunders died of Hodgkin's lymphoma in Minneapolis, Minnesota, aged 60. ==References== ==Other websites== * NBA.com Profile Category:1955 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:Cancer deaths in Minnesota Category:Deaths from Hodgkin's lymphoma Category:National Basketball Association coaches Category:Sportspeople from Cleveland Category:Sportspeople from Minneapolis
title: Flip Saunders
